metadata.title: CVE-2017-14731 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
ofx_proc_file in ofx_preproc.cpp in LibOFX 0.9.12 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and applicationcrash) via a crafted file, as demonstrated by an ofxdump call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14731` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libofx7 - 1:0.9.12-1
ofx - 1:0.9.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libofx package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.12-1').
